title: 25 card raw lot w/ 3 HOF - $425 - also priced as singles
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: 25 card raw lot w/ 3 HOF - $425 - also priced as singles
posts.post_content:
Take the entire lot at $425, or singles as priced below.  Regarding priority, I'll favor larger dollar orders.

For any order under $25, please add $2 for delivery; paypal preferred.
